title: Ermanno Fasoli
text: Ermanno Fasoli (born 9 November 1943) is an Italian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201964%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20welterweight">men's light welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1964%20Summer%20Olympics">1964 Summer Olympics</a>.
